explanation.text:
Explanation
Male anoles have a retractable gular fold that is used to attract mates and to chase off rivals.
When a lizard intend to attract a mate, it will arch its back and lower its gular fold.
The gular fold also swells when the lizard is in aggressive mode.

explanation.text:
Explanation
In the book of exodus16:22-27, we see the story of the isrealites and moses living in the wilderness after being delivered from the egyptians captivity. God had instructed his people through moses to rest on the sabath day and not even manna was suppose to be sourced for on that day. But some of the isrealites disobeyed this instruction and went out on the said sabath day to get manna but surprisingly, they couldnt find any.
exo16:27 Nevertheless, some of the people went out on the seventh day to gather it, but they found none.

options.text: The manna melted in the pot
